reviews.text: The restaurant has been modernised recently. On a Saturday evening there is live music. We had the lamb, which was cooked perfectly and the Barramundi with squid ink which was also awesome. The kids had burgers (which were home made patties) and the fish and chips, which was really good. The kids meals came with an ice cream included. The service was without exception very friendly and professional. We will be back. Great to see a hotel in Rocky realigning themselves to a more quality orientated market.
reviews.title: Interesting menu and good kids meals

reviews.text: This place may look professional but so so far from it seriously for the price if the food you would expect table service but nope... Have to go order yourself and after a 45 min wait the food was very small and not very enjoyable trying to much to make it look fancy rather then taste nice. Would definitely choose other restaurants over this place
reviews.title: Pathetic

reviews.text: The PA is very flash inside now and the service is very prompt and friendly. I only went for lunch and was a little disappointed at the same old, same old menu that you see everywhere - steak, pizza and parmy! Food was quite good though for what it was. Keen to go back and try the delish looking dinner menu.
reviews.title: Best pub in Rocky
A nice makeover and good allrounder
reviews.text: I had lunch there with some work mates and what a surprise. A very modern makeover, good menu and very cold beers. I'll be back.

The best in Rocky, cannot fault the service, special mention of Sarah, the food/beverage Supervisor, who makes sure your dining experience is special. The menu is above pub meals expectations, extensive and well presented. I recommend the PA to anybody who wants a quiet relaxed dining experience. We are regulars to the PA and have never been disappointed with the standard of service and meals each time we visit.
reviews.title: Never Disappoints!!!
